name: The Troubled Train
description:
Take on the role of the engineer of a train with many, MANY, issues! Your company, the Mule Desert Express, has fitted their trains with state-of-the-art solutions to any issue that may present itself, but will you be able to utilize these effectively to keep the train safe?

Changelog -

  • v1.01LD: All common resolutions should now work properly.  Experimental OSX and Linux versions added.
